text: tatha (he nabee! yaad karo) jab allaah ne unase drdh vachan liya tha, jo pustak[1] diye gaye ki tum avashy ise logon ke lie ujaagar karate rahoge aur ise chhupaoge nahin. to unhonne is vachan ko apane peechhe daal diya (bhang kar diya) aur usake badale tanik mooly khareed[2] liya. to ve kitanee buree cheez khareed rahe hain
